message: I understand you want a larger share, but a fair 50/50 split is the best way to ensure we both benefit. The value decreases each round, so let's not risk losing it all.
Considering the inflation, I need a bit more to make up for the loss.
This offer acknowledges the inflation while still being a reasonable compromise.  Let's settle this before the value drops further.
Inflation is taking its toll, I need a larger share to compensate.

Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Take this offer and we both win. Reject it and we risk getting nothing. Don't let greed cloud your judgement.
